title: That $85,000 Retirement Only Looks Comfortable Until You Hit Year 20
full_text: That $85,000 Retirement Only Looks Comfortable Until You Hit Year 20. An $85,000 annual retirement income is well above median U.S. household income and could cover most middle-class expenses. But whether this provides genuine ....
